name: HELIFLY PTY LTD
about: Helifly Pty Ltd, located at Albury Airport, offers comprehensive helicopter flight training and a range of aviation services. Founded in 2011, Helifly is led by Marianne Evans, who brings over 20 years of industry experience. We provide training for Private and Commercial Helicopter Licences using the Hughes 300 and R44 helicopters, and can also train in your own helicopter if needed. Our quiet, controlled airspace at Albury Airport ensures an excellent training environment. We offer scenic and joy flights, aerial work, and charter services. At Helifly, we are committed to surpassing customer expectations and making your aviation dreams a reality. Contact us to start your helicopter training journey today.
services: ["PPL-H (Private Pilot Licence Helicopter) and\nCPL-H (Commercial Pilot Licence Helicopter)\nHelicopter Theory"]
